A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was as if the director didn't know anything about the characters. Luke Skywalker never would have thrown the lightsaber over his shoulder\, and he sure as hell would not have given up on Ben Solo that easily. The horrible character development\, it was as if the director didn't even read anything about what was built up until this point. You can skip this movie and the Skywalker saga increases ten fold. Its not about \"catering to fans\" its about the director not knowing anything about this universe.
